activities: Gravity Technologies will collect the following personal information from its software application and website (collectively, “App”) users: (a) App user email addresses; (b) employer names; (c) username and passwords; (d) device identification information; (d) App language and country information; (e) communication made on or via the App; (f) job opening information; (g) App user interactions with the App, other App users and website and applications accessed via the App; and (h) Internet protocol addresses, standard web log information, and content provided to App users or their agents when seeking assistance. Such information is used to: (a) offer the App’s services or conduct Gravity Technologies’ business; (b) resolve disputes or troubleshoot problems; (c) encourage safe interaction between App users; (d) enforce policies and agreements associated with the App; (e) customize, measure and improve user experience on the App; and (f) contact App users.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data of Gravity Technologies employees, agents, clients and their customers that is processed online, offline and manually.
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau (BBB) EU Safe Harbor Program.
